title: Patrick Mix gets replacement opponent for Bellator 232; main card bout order set
text:
Patrick Mix has a new opponent for Saturday’s Bellator 232 event, and now the main card lineup is finalized.

Promotional newcomer Isaiah Chapman (9-3 MMA, 0-0 BMMA) will step in to fight Mix (11-0 MMA, 1-0 BMMA) in the bantamweight matchup after Dominic Mazzotta was forced to withdraw from the card due to injury.

MMA Junkie verified the change with a Bellator official following an initial report from MMAFighting.com.

Bellator 232 takes place at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn. The main card streams on DAZN following prelims on MMA Junkie.

The latest Bellator 232 lineup now includes:

MAIN CARD (DAZN, 10 p.m. ET)

Rory MacDonald vs. Douglas Lima

Paul Daley vs. Sabah Homasi

Isaiah Chapman vs. Patrick Mix

Javy Ayala vs. Vitaly Minakov

Luis Muro vs. Nick Newell

Cris Lencioni vs. Robin van Roosmalen

PRELIMINARY CARD (MMA Junkie, 6:45 p.m. ET)
